title: Simulation-Based Pediatric Emergency Medicine Fellowship Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning structure providing modular simulation-based learning via smartphone-based LMS, integrated with offline practical sessions

learning_goals: Learners can perform core pediatric emergency procedures (intubation, intravenous access, etc.) with over 80% accuracy.
Teams can achieve over 75% team efficiency scores in simulation scenarios by applying team-based crisis resource management (CRM) strategies.
Apply a structured emergency care protocol of at least level 4 in the simulation evaluation of polytrauma patients.

resources: Offline Practical Training Equipment Rental System
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
